function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on author expertise may introduce bias in case study selection","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unverified anticipated outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited representation of conservation settings and cultures in case study selection","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased hunting and harvesting pressure on domestic animals and wildlife due to covid-related societal changes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Declines in travel and tourism revenue affecting conservation funding","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Novel zoonotic disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Premature death of conservationists due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental, economic, and societal changes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, such as covid-19, impacting global society","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models supporting conservation efforts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited empirical work on covid-19 and entrepreneurship","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-stationarity of the series, as indicated by the kpss test.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of long-run linkages between macroeconomic variables and bank profile components.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High npl/l ratios in asean countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of econometric equations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Empirical analysis based on pca and cluster analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Calculation of soundness based on financial variables","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preliminary tests for kmo and bartlett tests","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of common opinion on variables for calculating the soundness of banks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct impact of banks’ financial performance on their soundness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical techniques for categorizing banks based on creditworthiness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate credit guarantee ratio in a recession","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data for all asean member states","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Novelty of the study","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex model formulation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Empirical study based on theoretical model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex loan demand equations may lead to incorrect loan assessments and allocations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate equilibrium loan amount calculations may result in under or over-financing of small and medium enterprises smes .","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-optimal credit guarantee ratio determination may increase the risk of loan default and financial losses.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moral hazard resulting from adopting the same credit guarantee ratio for all banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete modeling of the credit guarantee ratio may lead to suboptimal policy decisions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate lending technology for credit-rationed smes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost of borrowing for smes in developing nations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Credit constraints affecting smes’ employment and operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural challenges in the long run","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in cash flow risk for smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of academic study on the impact of covid-19 on asean economies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on smes in asean countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpreparedness of smes to face disruptions caused by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in smes can lead to the rapid risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data governance and quality control","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability in
